data.text: @ReporterTeresa @InfoPEI Spiking every day and a matter of time the Hospital will be Full of patients
@ReporterTeresa @InfoPEI How high?! Until the number of spiking cases in #PEI causes DrM & Denny to admit that this was NOT fully anticipated as part of their reopening "plan"?!
@ReporterTeresa @InfoPEI So much for us who are immune compromised. We are thrown to the wolves!

@ReporterTeresa @InfoPEI 😂 Dr. Heather Morrison quotes “Teresa, I think I’ve addressed this. We’re trying to think of everyone.. risk is challenging. [we can’t sacrifice the many for the few. The relative risk is low for most]”
@ReporterTeresa @InfoPEI It's also not required to come or return to PEI 🙄
@ReporterTeresa @givepeazachance @InfoPEI I was at Borden site Dr M said we no longer had to test if we didn’t have symptoms.
@ReporterTeresa @InfoPEI would be ironic, but my guess is someone used copy and paste, and changed the date, but didn't read the whole thing again.

@ReporterTeresa @InfoPEI I wonder if this is just them not updating their messaging templates. 
The numbers updates they are posting every couple days still says to see school outbreaks, click link to PSB website, then on the website it say they are no longer posting info on school outbreaks.
